verse: This is what the Eternal Lord showed me: He brought a swarm of locusts when the crops had begun to sprout in late spring (after the kingâ€™s portion of the hay had been cut).
When I saw the locusts devour everything green in the land that belonged to the farmers, I spoke.
The Eternal relented and showed mercy.
Then the Eternal Lord showed me this: He called for a rain of fire, and it devoured the deep abyss and began to devour the land itself.
And the Eternal again relented and showed mercy.
Then He showed me this: The Lord was standing by a wall built with a plumb line, and in His hand was a plumb line.
Then Amaziah, the priest at the royal shrine in Bethel, sent word to Jeroboam, king of Israel.
